summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.1°C) and outside temperature (up 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8549 lux) and cloud levels (up 326 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13990 lux), cloud levels (up 1906 m), outside temperature (up 2.0°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 326.2m lower than yesterday, 824.4m lower than the past week, 1905.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 740.8m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, very clammy and humid and winds will be practically absent. Rain showers likely, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
